lines.text: Stand still. I took your belt, your pants may come down...
But I hit your nerve point... how could you steal my belt?
[Hong-Chung looks at his newborn child for the first time... ]

[tied up in a tree]
If I want to urinate in the middle of the night, will you believe it's raining?
Hon-lam, strangle his groin so it won't rain tonight!
[Hon-lam gets a rope and approaches Fox]
Hey. Hey! Boy, don't fool around... hey! Hey! Hey!

[grabs a rock]
Fox, shut up or we'll bury you right here!

[fighting]
This is Never-Die - I can't even help myself!
